      • centerAndShow

        public static void centerAndShow(java.awt.Window window)

      • handleError

        public static void handleError(java.awt.Component parent,
                               java.lang.Exception exception)
        Simple error handling. Shows the exception message within a dialog box.
        Parameters:
        parent - The frame in which the dialog is displayed. If null a default Frame is used.
        exception - Any exception thrown during handling error.
